div.p: To the royal scribe of the Arsinoite nome, the Herakleides district, from (N.N. son of) Pakysis (?) son of Apynchis ... from the village of Soknopaiou Nesοs of the Herakleides district. On the nth day of the month … in the 18th year of the emperor N.N. Stotoetis son of Satabous died … of the same … Translation: K.A. Worp, BASP 53 (2016) 72-73 Nr. 8
